co.cask.coopr.provisioner

Class Provisioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.provisioner.Provisioner

  • public class Provisioner
extends Object
    Provisioner information, such as the total capacity of the provisioner and how many workers are assigned and live for each tenant the provisioner has.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Provisioner(String id, String host, Integer port, Integer capacityTotal, Map<String,Integer> usage, Map<String,Integer> assignments) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object o) 
      Set<String> getAssignedTenants()
      Get the unmodifiable set of tenants that are assigned to the provisioner.
      int getAssignedWorkers(String tenantId)
      Get the number of workers assigned to the given tenant on this provisioner.
      int getCapacityFree()
      Get the number of workers that can be added to the provisioner.
      int getCapacityTotal()
      Get the total capacity of the provisioner.
      String getHost()
      Get the host the provisioner is running on.
      String getId()
      Get the id of the provisioner.
      Set<String> getLiveTenants()
      Get the unmodifiable set of tenants that have live workers on the provisioner.
      int getLiveWorkers(String tenantId)
      Get the number of live workers for the given tenant on this provisioner.
      int getPort()
      Get the port the provisioner is running on.
      Map<String,Integer> getUsage()
      Get an immutable mapping of tenants to number of live workers for that tenant.
      int hashCode() 
      void removeTenantAssignments(String tenantId)
      Remove all assigned workers for the given tenant from this provisioner.
      void setUsage(Map<String,Integer> usage)
      Sets the usage information for this provisioner, which contains number of live workers per tenant.
      String toString() 
      int tryAddTenantAssignments(String tenantId, int numToAdd)
      Try assigning additional workers to a tenant, capping out if the number to add would make the total assignments go over the total capacity of the provisioner.
      int tryRemoveTenantAssignments(String tenantId, int numToRemove)
      Try removing assigned workers from a tenant, capping out if the number to remove is greater than the number currently assigned.

      • removeTenantAssignments

        public void removeTenantAssignments(String tenantId)
        Remove all assigned workers for the given tenant from this provisioner.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - Tenant to remove from the provisioner.

      • tryAddTenantAssignments

        public int tryAddTenantAssignments(String tenantId,
                          int numToAdd)
        Try assigning additional workers to a tenant, capping out if the number to add would make the total assignments go over the total capacity of the provisioner.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - Tenant to assign additional workers to.
        numToAdd - Number of additional workers to try and assign to the tenant.
        Returns:
        Number of additional workers actually assigned to the tenant.

      • tryRemoveTenantAssignments

        public int tryRemoveTenantAssignments(String tenantId,
                             int numToRemove)
        Try removing assigned workers from a tenant, capping out if the number to remove is greater than the number currently assigned.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - Tenant to remove assigned workers from.
        numToRemove - Number of workers to try and remove from the tenant.
        Returns:
        Number of assigned workers actually removed from the tenant.

      • getAssignedWorkers

        public int getAssignedWorkers(String tenantId)
        Get the number of workers assigned to the given tenant on this provisioner.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - Tenant to get the number of assigned workers for.
        Returns:
        Number of workers assigned to the given tenant on this provisioner.

      • getLiveWorkers

        public int getLiveWorkers(String tenantId)
        Get the number of live workers for the given tenant on this provisioner.

        Returns:
        Number of live workers for the given tenant on this provisioner.
